name: monitor-input-switch
title: Monitor Input Switch
description: Switch monitor input source via DDC/CI commands
author: danilo

preferences.name: controlMyMonitorPath
preferences.title: ControlMyMonitor Path (Windows)
preferences.description: Full path to ControlMyMonitor.exe on Windows

preferences.name: monitorId
preferences.title: Monitor Identifier
preferences.description: Monitor ID for ControlMyMonitor (Windows). Use 'Primary' or specific ID from discovery.

commands.name: switch-to-displayport
commands.title: Switch to DisplayPort
commands.subtitle: Monitor Input
commands.description: Switch monitor input to DisplayPort (typically: switch to Windows PC)

commands.name: switch-to-hdmi
commands.title: Switch to HDMI
commands.subtitle: Monitor Input
commands.description: Switch monitor input to HDMI (typically: switch to Mac)

commands.name: discover-inputs
commands.title: Discover Input Codes
commands.subtitle: Monitor Input
commands.description: Read current input value and list available DDC/CI information

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
